purpleculture_pinyin:
jiǎng
surname Jiang; refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蒋介石
фамилия Цзян; относится к Чан Кайши Чан Кайши
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 蒋)
Pictophonetic: 將 indicates the sound; 艹 (grass) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
蔣經國 [ jiǎng jīng guó ]: Chiang Ching-kuo (1910-1988), son of Chiang Kai-shek 蒋介石 , Guomindang politician, president of ROC 1978-1988
蔣雯麗 [ jiǎng wén lì ]: Jiang Wenli (1969-), award-winning PRC film actress
蔣介石 [ jiǎng jiè shí ]: Chiang Kai-shek (1887-1975), military leader, head of the Nationalist government in China 1928-1949 and the government in exile on Taiwan 1950-1975
蔣公 [ jiǎng gōng ]: honorific title for Chiang Kai-shek 蒋介石
蔣士銓 [ jiǎng shì quán ]: Jiang Shiquan (1725-1784), Qing poet, one of Three great poets of the Qianlong era 乾嘉三大家
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 將 [ jiāng ] the future, what will be; ready, prepared; a general
heisig_chinese_memo: General Jiang used to be a famous Chinese general and so the people would put flowers around him in celebration.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: General Jiang used to be a famous Chinese general and so the people would put flowers around him in celebration.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " Cottage ", " will " sound. The original meaning is rice, also known as water bamboo shoots, water bamboo shoots, is a perennial herb. "Shuowen": "Jiang, Zhu Jiang also. Congcha, Jiang Sheng." Such as "Han Feizi. "Ten Passages" "Jiang Xipoyuan", Wang Xianshen's collected commentary quoted the old note: "Jiang, cursive name." Zhang Pingzi "Fu of the Southern Capital": "The grass is Ribes, Lily Wan, Jiang Pu Jiao."

" Jiang " is the name of the princes of the Zhou Dynasty. "Zuo Zhuan. "The Twenty-four Years of Xi Gong": "Fan, Jiang, Xing, Mao, Yin, Ji, Zhou Gong's Yin Ye." Yang Bojun's note: "Jiang, according to "General History. The Second Clan", is the third son of Zhou Gong The country was sealed. According to Du's note, there is Jiangji in the northeast of Gushi County, Henan Province today, and it is the place immediately." "The Twelve Years of Xianggong": "So Lu was the Jiji and came to the Zhou Temple; it was Xing, Fan, Jiang, Mao, Xing, and Ji, and came to the Zhougong Temple." " Jiang " is also used as a surname.
humanum_short_description_en: From the " Cottage ", " will " sound. The original meaning is rice, also known as water bamboo shoots, water bamboo shoots, is a perennial herb.
humanum_full_description:
從「艸」，「將」聲。本義是菰，又名茭笋、茭白，是一種多年生草本植物。《說文》：「蔣，苽蔣也。从艸，將聲。」如《韓非子．十過》「蔣席頗緣」，王先慎集解引舊注：「蔣，草名。」《文選．張平子〈南都賦〉》：「其草則藨苧薠莞，蔣蒲蒹葭。」

　　「蔣」是周代諸侯國名。《左傳．僖公二十四年》：「凡、蔣、邢、茅、胙、祭，周公之胤也。」楊伯峻注：「蔣，據《通志．氏族略二》，為周公第三子伯齡所封國。據杜注，今河南省固始縣東北有蔣集，當即其地。」又《左傳．襄公十二年》：「是故魯為諸姬，臨於周廟；為邢、凡、蔣、茅、胙、祭，臨於周公之廟。」「蔣」也用作姓。
humanum_short_description: 從「艸」，「將」聲。本義是菰，又名茭笋、茭白，是一種多年生草本植物。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
蔣 (Simplified: 蒋)
Pinyin: jiǎng
English Definition: surname Jiang; refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蒋介石
Total strokes: 14; Radical: 艸
Pictophonetic: 將 indicates the sound; 艹 (grass) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 將 [ jiāng ] the future, what will be; ready, prepared; a general
Example Words:
蔣經國 [ jiǎng jīng guó ]: Chiang Ching-kuo (1910-1988), son of Chiang Kai-shek 蒋介石 , Guomindang politician, president of ROC 1978-1988
蔣雯麗 [ jiǎng wén lì ]: Jiang Wenli (1969-), award-winning PRC film actress
蔣介石 [ jiǎng jiè shí ]: Chiang Kai-shek (1887-1975), military leader, head of the Nationalist government in China 1928-1949 and the government in exile on Taiwan 1950-1975
蔣公 [ jiǎng gōng ]: honorific title for Chiang Kai-shek 蒋介石
蔣士銓 [ jiǎng shì quán ]: Jiang Shiquan (1725-1784), Qing poet, one of Three great poets of the Qianlong era 乾嘉三大家

蔣字的基本解释

蔣
jiǎng
见“蒋”。

蔣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiāng］
［《廣韻》即良切，平陽，精。］
“蒋1”的繁体字。
(1)植物名。菰。即茭白。
(2)见“蔣蔣”。
[②]［jiǎng］
［《廣韻》即兩切，上養，精。］
“蒋2”的繁体字。
(1)通“奬”。参见“蔣2厲”。
(2)周时诸侯国名。
(3)姓。

蔣字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蔣； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1055第06
【唐韻】卽良切【集韻】資良切，?音漿。【說文】苽蔣。【前漢·司馬相如傳】蔣芋靑薠。　又【廣韻】卽兩切，音槳。【左傳·僖二十四年】凡蔣邢茅。　又山名。【晉書·成帝紀】蘇峻至于蔣山。　又水名。【水經注】涂水南與蔣谷水合流出蔣谿。　又姓。　又【韻會】菰蔣，亦作上聲。

蔣字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蔣字的起名意思

暂无。

Chiang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiāng］
["Guangyun" is good cut, Pingyang, fine. ]
Traditional characters for "蒋1".
(1) Plant name. mushroom. Namely Zizania.
(2) See "Jiang Jiang".
[②]［jiǎng］
["Guangyun" means two cuts, top nourishment and fineness. ]
Traditional characters for "蒋2".
(1) Through "award". See "Jiang 2 Li".
(2) The names of the princes in Zhou Dynasty.
(3) Last name.
Chiang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Characters] 　 Jiang; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1055 06
[Tang Yun] Good cut [Ji Yun] Good cut, sound pulp. 【Said the text】Chu Jiang. 【Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Biography】Jiang Taro.　[Guangyun] 卽 cut in two, sound paddle. [Twenty-four years of Zuo Zhuan·Xi] Fan Jiang Xingmao.　Also the name of the mountain. 【Book of Jin·Chengdiji】Su Jun is as far as Jiang Shan.　Also known as water. [Shui Jing Zhu] Tu Shuinan merged with Jiang Gu to flow out of Jiangxi.　Another last name.　[Rhyme Club] Wang Jiang, also voiced.
